thread.title: Number of Icon Packs are Free on Google Play Right Now
thread.title_full: Number of Icon Packs are Free on Google Play Right Now | Droid Life

author: Tim-o-tato
title: Number of Icon Packs are Free on Google Play Right Now
text:
Should you consider yourself a fan of custom icon packs, such as the one shown above (Griddy), you’ll find a few developers are taking advantage of Google Play’s new discount feature, offering various packs free of charge. Most of these packs range in the $1 to $2 range, and you’ll never hear me complain about free icon packs. To use these icon packs, you’ll need a launcher such as Nova Launcher, or any other launcher that supports 3rd-party icon packs. There are plenty of launchers to choose from on Google Play, so take your pick. As for the packs, they all range in look, offering anywhere from 600+ to 3500+ custom icons, all looking quite different and capable of aligning with whatever look you’re going for. Check them all out and just download them. They’re free! Free Icon Pack Links
  • Griddy
  • Timbul
  • DmonD
  • Tembus
  • Smoke & Glass
  • Karmanu
Have at ’em!
